long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Image Downloader free Chrome extension for browse and download images on the web!

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Main Feature:
🔍 Image search: it will automatically scan all the images available on the present page and show their list inside Image Downloader interface.
📏 Filter by size: filter images by size to make selection easier.
📥 Bulk image downloader: download several images simultaneously with Image Downloader.
🖼️ Multiple image formats: supports png, svg, jpeg, gif, webp, bmp, ico and tiff.
📁 Specify download location: select folder to save the downloaded images.
🔗 Image URL: get the direct link for any image.
👀 In Image Downloader, look through each image in picture preview to make sure its precisely what you would like before downloading.
🌎 Support for popular image sites: Works with sites like Unsplash, Google Images, Pinterest and more.
⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
